metadata.name: Windows Credential Manager Access via VaultCmd
metadata.comment: List credentials currently stored in Windows Credential Manager via the native Windows utility vaultcmd.exe

batch.sql: SELECT * FROM process_activity WHERE time BETWEEN CURRENT_TIMESTAMP() - INTERVAL 24 HOUR AND CURRENT_TIMESTAMP() AND (lower(activity_id) = lower('1') AND endswith(lower(process.name), lower('\\vaultcmd.exe')) AND lower(process.file.name) = lower('vaultcmd.exe') AND contains(lower(process.cmd_line), lower('/listcreds:')))

output.summary: List credentials currently stored in Windows Credential Manager via the native Windows utility vaultcmd.exe
